EmailTemplate.subject: We Haven't Heard From You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We Haven't Heard From You Yet Please Tell Us How We're Doing
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Client}},
We haven't heard from you yet and would appreciate a few minutes of your time to complete our Customer Satisfaction Survey. Your feedback matters and we count on it.
Click here. <https://survey.qualtrics.com/SE/?SID=SV_7ZN3rkNGHLEb9fT>
Thank you! TriTech Software Systems
